channel.title: Pming
channel.description: Well I have problems with when a admin owner or mod pms someone the person they pm gets frozen sometimes how do I fix this?Also I am using Allstarscape.

item.title: Pming
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

If it doesn’t work, it could be the client

Only works if the client hasn’t got a glitch in it

Read full topic

item.title: Pming
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Open client.java and search

case 126:

and it should look like

[code] case 126: // pm message
long friendtosend = inStream.readQWord();
byte pmchatText[] = new byte[100];
int pmchatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 8);

        inStream.readBytes(pmchatText, pmchatTextSize, 0);
        for (int i1 = 0; i1 < friends.length; i1++) {
            if (friends[i1] == friendtosend) {
                boolean pmsent = false;
                pmlog();

                for (int i2 = 1; i2 < handler.maxPlayers; i2++) {
                    if (handler.players[i2] != null
                            && handler.players[i2].isActive
                            && misc.playerNameToInt64(
                                    handler.players[i2].playerName)
                                            == friendtosend) {
                        if (playerRights >= 2
                                || handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 0
                                || (handler.players[i2].Privatechat == 1
                                        && handler.players[i2].isinpm(
                                                misc.playerNameToInt64(
                                                        playerName)))) {
                            handler.players[i2].sendpm(
                                    misc.playerNameToInt64(playerName),
                                    playerRights, pmchatText, pmchatTextSize);
                            pmsent = true;
                        }
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (!pmsent) {
                    sendMessage("Player currently not available");
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        break;[/code]

Pretty obvious

Read full topic
